publicHomeSubtitle: Join to experience the full experience!
publicHomeDescription: Sign up to gain access to the latest news, results, and much more.
homeText1: Formula 1 is the most prestigious and followed motorsport category in the world. With a history dating back to 1950, it features the fastest and most technologically advanced cars competing on some of the planet's most iconic circuits.
homeText2: Each season is filled with excitement with legendary teams like Ferrari, Mercedes, and Red Bull, and drivers who push the limits of speed and skill. Stay updated with the latest F1 news and events here.
newsDescription: Stay up to date with the latest news about Formula 1. From historic victories to the latest team updates, we have it all covered!
championshipsDescription: Here you will find the latest statistics and standings in the current season's constructors' and drivers' championships.
driversDescription: Discover information about your favorite drivers and mark one as a favorite to follow closely.
aboutDescription: This personal project has been developed as part of my assessment in my current job and consists of developing a project in React that includes, at a minimum: routing, reusable components, API integrations, forms, error handling, internationalization, data persistence, authentication, Hooks, and unit testing with JEST.
contactFormDescription: If you wish to get in touch, please fill out the form below.
phoneError: The phone number must have 9 digits.
dniError: The ID number is incorrect, please check the numbers and the letter.
contactFormErrorMessage: Please correct the errors in the form.
favouriteDriverTitle: This is your favorite driver! An exceptional driver who always gives their best in every race.
favouriteDriverText2: and enjoy every race with them in the lead!
name: Name
